bug.author: chausner-audeering
bug.summary: Model is not opened on first app start
bug.description:
Small bug: when installing the app freshly on a new system and opening a model file without having opened the app before, after confirming the privacy notice on first startup, the model file is not opened.
Netron app and version: 4.7.0 desktop app
Steps to Reproduce:
Install Netron for the first time Double-click an ONNX file. Accept the privacy policy.
